name: I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here!
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Welcome to I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

Join the Celebrities deep in the heart of the jungle... isolated from the luxuries of modern life, you will have to endure everything the jungle can throw at you AND handle living with the other Celebrities for 20 days! Bugs, trials and strategy - it's up to you to find the perfect balance that will lead you to final victory and become long or queen of the jungle! (screenshot captions)
  • Eat the most insects from the bowl and use the Nintendo DS stylus to control your gag reflex!
  • Catch as many stars as you can to win the Bush Battle and be immune from the public's vote.
  • Can you handle the other Celebrities' strong personalities and make friends?
